## StrategyAdapter.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `StrategyAdapter` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(strategy: Strategy, name: string, userProfileFactory?: UserProfileFactory<U>);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
